data.title: Residential Landscapes
data.meta_description: Our residential division works closely with homeowners to create unique spaces that make you proud to entertain and live in each day.
data.text:
CHRIS HOPKINS

DIRECTOR & PROJECT MANAGER

Chris Hopkins is the founding sole owner and creativity for all the behind the scenes and business growth that has made Three Seasons what it is today. He will be the one meeting with you at an initial consultation, putting together your estimate proposal, designs and coordinating details throughout the process. He will be side by side between his construction team and the client to ensure projects go better than planned.

When Chris isn't working or thinking of innovative ways to grow his business, you can find him enjoying time with his wife and dogs at their home in Caledonia or spending time outdoors.

Matthew Ott

PROJECT MANAGER

Matt attended Mohawk College for the Architectural Technology Program - specializing in construction. He has been around the construction industry for most of his life, as many of his friends & family members work within it. He enjoys working with people and building great relationships.

When Matt is not working, you can find him spending time with his fiancÃ©e and dog, working around his house, and enjoying the outdoors.

Adam Hitchcock

Marketing Manager

Adam attended Mohawk College's Business Program, specializing in Marketing. Adam has worked in both the residential construction industry and the marketing industry since graduating from Mohawk College in 2018. He enjoys getting creative with all types of work including filming our crews on-site, taking a photo for our latest project, or planning a company event. We are sure you will see Adam on-site or at a home show near you this season.

â

When Adam is not working, you can find him on the golf course or on Lake Erie.

Ron Bremer

Accounting

After 40 years in the computer industry as a technical consultant, Ron started his second career as a bookkeeping specialist. Known for his organizational skills and attention to detail, he takes pride in ensuring Three Season Landscapesâ financial records are accurate and up-to-date.

When Ron wants to get away, he is most likely travelling or camping with Marian in their Escape fifth-wheel camper. While on vacation, Ronâs motto is: âWorking on my laptop in the morning; working on my tan in the afternoon.â

Matthew Bouwers

Field Operations Manager

Matt graduated from Mohawk College as a red seal certified Horticultural Technician. With over 10 years of experience in landscaping and construction, Matt is a true team player, and his leadership skills and attention to detail help to make every project a success. He strives to make work fun and enjoys working out in nature every day.

When Matt is not working, he can be found mountain biking on Hamiltonâs trails, taking family walks with his two dogs, partner and their newborn, or playing disc golf with family and friends.

Jensen Maunder

Construction Foreman

Jensen graduated the horticulture technician program at Fanshawe college with a focus on hardscaping. He has been in the landscape industry for 7 years and enjoys constructing high end residential properties. Jensen is a proud member of the Three Seasons team, with his knowledge in plants and hardscape, he ensures your backyard oasis is everything youâve dreamed of.

When Jensen is not working, you can find him on the golf course (shooting below par) or shredding the snowboard slopes.

Austin Gater

Construction Foreman

Austin is a construction Forman and has been working within the construction field for most of his life. He grew up being inspired by his family who all work within trades. Austin takes pleasure in being able to make dreams come true!

Outside of work, you can find Austin out on the boat enjoying water sports as well as fishing. In his spare time, he also enjoys hanging out with his friends and family.

Graydon Boecker

Construction Foreman

Graydon is a commercial landscape Foreman. He has been around construction throughout his entire life, with friends and family in the industry.

When Graydon is not working, you can find him working on his house, enjoying the outdoors and spending time with family and friends.

Sierra Rodrigues

Hydrant Coatings Operator

Sierra started painting interior homes about 6 years ago. She now works on our team as the Fire Hydrant Operator/Supervisor painting the fire hydrants in the City of Hamilton. Sierra enjoys working around the city and interacting with people in the community.

When she is not working, Sierra loves spending her free time with her family. Her and her son love exploring the outdoors, whether it be hiking, fishing or kayaking.
